## Installation

You can install the released version of zoobiomass from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("viyomo/zoobiomass")

```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(zoobiomass)
## basic example code
zoobiomass("brac", 234)
```
